docs.text: 5G NR Dynamic Power Sharing LTE/NR •MTK guide about dynamic power sharing (https://newsletter.mediatek.com/hubfs/mwc/download/ul-enhancements.pdf) •R1-1800942 UE Dynamic power sharing for LTE-NR Dual Connectivity PHR calculation •PHR calculation in uplink (http://sharetechnote.com/html/Handbook_LTE_PHR.html) BSR •BSR report LTE BSR: https://www.sharetechnote.com/html/Handbook_LTE_BSR.html PDCCH •DCI format: https://www.sharetechnote.com/html/5G/5G_DCI.html
